flawed_nl_solution:
Santana has 1 + 1 + 2 = <<1+1+2=5>>5 brothers with birthdays in the second half of the year.
She has 7 brothers - 5 brothers = <<7-5=2>>2 brothers with birthdays in the first half of the year.
Altogether, she has to buy 5 + 7 = <<5+7=12>>12 presents in the second half of the year.
Therefore, she has to buy 12 - 2 = <<12-2=10>>10 more presents in the second half of the year.
#### 10

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 5. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
